ComicInfo.Summary:
As Mary goes toe-to-toe with the Blacksmith, she is found asking herself a whole lot of questions. Who is he? Why has he been slaughtering the homeless of New Orleans? And, most importantly, why aren't her powers working against him?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Drew Edward Johnson & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Harvey Tolibao & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | John Royle, Jagdish Kumar & Sebastian Cheng | 3 | D | Cover D | Riveiro & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | E | In-Store Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Sabine Rich | Missing | F | Armed Forces Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Keith Garvey | Missing |
